projects.title: Audio Normalization Tool
projects.subtitle: Normalize or boost audio tracks of movies and shows
projects.details: This project is a simple command-line tool for normalizing audio tracks in media files. It uses FFmpeg to process audio files and provides options to normalize the audio track for a single media file, normalize audio tracks for all media files in a directory, and apply a simple audio boost to a media file. The tool calculates the average volume level of the audio track and adjusts it to a target level, making the audio more consistent and balanced. It also supports parallel processing to speed up the normalization process for multiple files.

projects.title: YouTube Video Downloader
projects.subtitle: Download videos, and mp3s from YouTube quickly with either a CLI or GUI.
projects.details: This application provides both a command line interface (CLI) and an graphical user interface (GUI) for downloading YouTube videos.
projects.tags: Python, ffmpeg, PowerShell, PyInstaller, CustomTkinter, Rich CLI

projects.title: Plex Poster Set Helper (Fork)
projects.subtitle: A tool to help upload sets of posters from ThePosterDB or MediUX to your Plex server in seconds!
projects.details: A fork created from a repository from GitHub user bbrown430. Added was a custom GUI tool, as well as a more interactive CLI.

projects.title: NVIDIA Driver Grabber
projects.subtitle: Simply grab the latest NVIDIA drivers
projects.details: This is a simple web page that grabs the latest NVIDIA drivers for you. Replaces the need to register with geforce expierence or manually search for the latest drivers. This project was created using basic JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

projects.title: 222 Discord Bot
projects.subtitle: A versatile Discord bot for music and more
projects.details: A versatile Discord bot for music and more, featuring an intuitive React-based dashboard. Designed as a beginner-friendly template, it's perfect for those looking to build and expand their own Discord bot projects.
projects.tags: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Node.js, Discord.js, React, Express, SQLite

projects.title: Online Media Converter
projects.subtitle: Convert your media files with ease
projects.details: This media utility web application that allows you to convert your media files. It also allows for optimization/compression of videos for social media platforms.
projects.tags: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Node.js, ffmpeg, sharp

projects.title: molex.cloud
projects.subtitle: Cloud Storage and File Sharing
projects.details: Molex Cloud is a cloud storage and file sharing platform that allows users to upload, store, and share files with ease. The platform offers a user-friendly interface and a range of features, including file organization, sharing options, and secure storage.
projects.tags: React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, SQLite, Express

projects.title: WorTool.com
projects.subtitle: A War of Rights Regimental Tool for the Gaming Community
projects.details: I'm currently crafting WorTool, an Angular/Typescript frontend application designed for War of Rights players & regiments. This tool seamlessly integrates with a Node.js Rest API utilizing Sequelize, and Express.js, providing users with an immersive experience. WoRTool offers detailed maps with advanced filtering, a comprehensive display of available weaponry, and keeps users informed on the latest news from Campfire Games. The standout features, however, revolve around regimental integration. Users can sync their WoRTool account with Discord for enhanced features, manage or represent their regiment, and access tools like the Event Share Tool, Steam Stats, and Company Roster Tool. The tool also includes a Discord bot for managing schedules, media, company roster and regimental profiles, aiming to create a centralized hub for regimental activities and community engagement within the War of Rights community.
projects.tags: Angular, TypeScript, REST, Tailwind CSS, JWT Auth, Node.js, Sequelize ORM, Discord.js, Express

projects.title: #PA Army App v1
projects.subtitle: A Comprehensive Application for In-Game Information and Guild Management.
projects.details: This project was a gaming community resource and management tool. It is a progressive web application that utilizes HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The application makes XHR/Fetch calls to a SQL database for data retrieval and manipulation. The level of authentication determines the availability of different features, and the application functions as a CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) application.

projects.title: Project Eunomia
projects.subtitle: A web-based client for The Palace 2D Chat
projects.details: This is a group project that aims to create a web-based client for The Palace 2D Avatar Chat originally created by Jim Bumgardner and produced by Time Warner in the mid-late 90s.

projects.title: Sensor Dashboard (Frontend)
projects.subtitle: A Dashboard for Sensors and IoT Devices
projects.details: This is a project aimed to provide a feature-rich dashboard and user interface for groups, or organizations to manage and track a wide variety of sensors and IoT devices.

projects.title: paarmy.com
projects.subtitle: Unifying Gamers: A Dynamic Home Webpage for an Active Gaming Community
projects.details: This project is a home page website catering to a large gaming community actively engaged in daily organized play. It combines a variety of cutting-edge technologies for seamless functionality. The backend leverages Node.js, Express, and Sequelize to power the REST API, while the frontend is built using Angular, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for a sleek and dynamic user interface.
projects.tags: Angular, Node.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, discord.js, REST, Sequelize ORM

projects.title: MolexMessenger
projects.subtitle: Socket.io Based Instant Messenger
projects.details: This is a web based instant messaging client with features such as sharing images, youtube, and streams, show users typing, as well as a few configurable user settings.

projects.title: Guild Roster Manager
projects.subtitle: Guild Roster Manager: Simplified Roster Management for Gaming Communities
projects.details: This project brings you a desktop application that acts as a bridge between a Node.js Discord bot and a user-friendly web interface for managing Discord server members. By utilizing the discord.js library, the application and the bot seamlessly communicate, enabling smooth data exchange. The bot plays a crucial role in mediating between Discord and the application, ensuring real-time updates and data synchronization. Moreover, administrators have the convenience of updating the shared data directly from Discord using simple commands. With this combined approach, managing Discord server members becomes hassle-free and accessible from both the application and Discord itself.
projects.tags: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, PHP, Node.js, discord.js
